sentences.en: Among the various translation principles, faithfulness and expressiveness are the two widely accepted principles.
sentences.cn: 在翻译标准中, 忠实和通顺是受到普遍接受的两个标准.

sentences.en: AOP does not replace existing programming paradigms and languages; instead, it works with them to improve their expressiveness and utility.
sentences.cn: AOP并不 替换现存的程序范例或语言，而是 与 它们协同工作以提高他们的表达能力与效用。

sentences.en: Crying is part of our natural expressiveness.
sentences.cn: 哭泣是自然情感的一种表现。

sentences.en: Faithfulness, expressiveness and elegance are the basic principles in translation.
sentences.cn: “信 、 达、雅”是翻译的基本要求.

sentences.en: His painting rose to a fresh expressiveness and revealed a shrewder insight.
sentences.cn: 他的画富有一种新的表达力,显示出更敏锐的洞察力.

sentences.en: If these issues are not handled well, the benefits of generic types can easily be outweighed by decreases in expressiveness and robustness.
sentences.cn: 如果这些问题处理得不当，那么可表达性和健壮性的降低会轻易地抵消泛型类型的好处。

sentences.en: Moreover, it offers the expressiveness which helps to “simplify complex tasks”.
sentences.cn: 此外，它更具表现力，这有助于“简化复杂任务”。

sentences.en: The audiences are impressed by the expressiveness of the actors.
sentences.cn: 演员们的丰富表情给观众留下了深刻的印象.

sentences.en: They introduce the expressiveness of floral design, each from his own recognizable and individual style.
sentences.cn: 他们发挥了花艺设计的创作力, 每一款出自他们的设计都充满各自的构想和风格.

sentences.en: To perform ( a role ) weakly or with insufficient expressiveness.
sentences.cn: 表演不充分表演 ( 角色 ) 不足或缺乏表现力.

sentences.en: What struck me first were the outward things, her animation and expressiveness.
sentences.cn: 首先让我很意外的是她的活力和表现力这样一些外在的东西.

sentences.en: You have no choice but to marvel at the pureness and expressiveness of his golden pipes.
sentences.cn: 聆听那些流畅自如的真假音转换是一种听觉享受,令人不得不为这副金嗓子的纯净度和表现力而赞叹.

words.tran_cn: 表现的；有表现力的；表达…的
表现地；意味深长地；表示地
快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
表达，表示；表情；表现力；措辞
